channel.title: Help with Java Interfaces(ithink its interfaces)[(317Delta)]
channel.description:
--------------AND I DONT KNOW WHAT SIDE TO DO IT CLIENT OR SOURCE(SERVER)---------------
Hello Can anyone help me with this: Listen if I have in client files a folder called sprites and inside the file i got some pictures Example STATICONS 17.png thats mean i should maybe have this in The client.java or something ? i mean i want to make an image called LOGINBOX.png and then add the picture to my login box at start How can i do it its interface? AND I USE (DELTA 317)atleast i think its delta idont have itemdef and stuff (src folders i dont have so i think its delta) anyways thank you ! Sorry if english messed up

item.title: Help with Java Interfaces(ithink its interfaces)[(317Delta)]

item.description:
@RSPS222 wrote:

OK so ill post it in client help and what to do with the sprites if i want to add umm Bank.png and then i want it to take part in my server because on my server i dont have bank.png or something so how does its load the picture of the bank? thats what i am asking
